isis.stitle: TSI 05-12-45 - Water Pump And Air Compressor Drive Pulley

subjectgroup.subject: Water Pump And Air Compressor Drive Pulley

geninfo.para: Water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840184C1) (Figure 1) must be installed when multiple air conditioning compressors or other non-OEM accessories are installed on the drive belt loop. This pulley is designed to handle additional drive belt accessory loads.
Water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840185C1) (Figure 2) is designed for production installed drive belt accessories only.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, install water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840184C1) when multiple air conditioning compressors or other non-OEM accessories are installed on the drive belt loop.

geninfo.para: If a failure of water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840185C1) is experienced, install water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840184C1).

note.para: There is no need to replace water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840185C1) if only production installed drive belt accessories are used.

figure.caption: Figure 1. Water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840184C1) (use with additional non-OEM accessories)

note.para: Both water pump and air compressor drive pulleys look similar. Water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840184C1) has a larger outer drive belt retaining flange and is heavier 2.05 kg (4.52 lb).

figure.caption: Figure 2. Water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840185C1) (use with production accessories only)

note.para: Water pump and air compressor drive pulley (1840185C1) has a smaller outer drive belt retaining flange and is lighter 1.44 kg (3.18 lb).
